attributes.review: I downloaded this app to learn more about my sugar daddy trump. But as soon as I agreed to the terms and conditions for this app, small pigeon ninjas showed up at my house. They attacked me and regurgitated all over my living room floor. My children are terrified and ran away. Sadly this app also played “shawtys like a melody in my head” for 5 hours straight non stop. I was unable to do anything else on my phone while this was happening. Please do not get this app!! Awful things will happen if you do so 🤢😔✌🏻.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE app🤢💔😭

attributes.review: Once this app began installing on my phone the entire devices software started slowing down so much so that I could barely use my phone at all. A few days later I tried to open the app and my entire phone shut down. When I brought it in to the Apple store they said there was no fixing it and I had to buy an entirely new phone. The first thing I wanted to do with it was leave this review and let everyone know how awful this app is.
attributes.title: This App Broke My Phone

attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I wanted to support the Cheeto puff. BUT instead I became a Troompa Loompa😖 As soon as I opened the app, my screen went black. Then when I looked in the mirror my skin was orange! I had hair that looked like what’s inside the corn ear! I couldn’t manage to say anything other than ‘Snowflake’ and “That’s taken out of context “. I couldn’t do or say anything useful! Then I injected myself with Lysol because that’s what Donnie suggested! I died and am now writing this from Purgatory. 0/10! Do NOT download this app!
attributes.title: Troompa Loompa

attributes.review: The app is hard to navigate and just has bad information. it makes my phone smell bad. my dog saw it was in my phone screen and decided to eat my phone. now i have to pay 800 dollars to get a new one. my life is ruined. my parents are mad at me. i am going broke. my girlfriend broke up with me. i need a phone for work and i literally can't take this. thanks a lot, mr president, for ruining every good thing that i had in my life. thanks a lot. 0/10 would not recommend.
attributes.title: Was genuinely terrible

attributes.review: The app took 6 hours to download, having fast wifi. Once opened app glitches in and out of our annoying orange president. When I try to sign up it says my address is being tracked which is terrifying. The app acted like a virus as it slowed down other apps and my phone crashed. I downloaded a anti-virus and it found this app to be the problem. The app is taking my personal information and threatening to share with the dark web. Please don’t download
attributes.title: What a terrible app

attributes.review: I used to support this man, until he took my rights and my family’s rights away. I don’t know how I was so blind to support this broken, orange toenail of a man. He knows nothing about politics and has ruined this country. He wanted to make this country how he wants it; to be his. His ideals for this now sad sack of dirt that I used to call home has ruined the lives of many. I’d rather have my three year old cousin be the president, because at least she knows how to be respectful, and knows the basics of human rights.
attributes.title: No More
